title: I need help with this italic...
content:
Does anyone recognize this italic face? Especially note the lower case “w”. Any help would be much appreciated!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001543im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/place_5619.gif)

 [‹ Help with font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001543/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47896 "Go to previous forum topic") [Being Wicked logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001543/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47894 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content:
I think it might be Stempel Schneidler Bold or Black that has been squooshed.

- Mike Yanega

[This sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/stempel_schneidler_std_complete_vp/?sample_text=New%20World) shows New World in Stempel Schneidler.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you, thank you, thank you! I can always depend on you guys!
